description: Skylar Price sits high up on the corporate ladder where she controls many people in their day to day lives. She secretly has an affair with a maintenance worker which plays out as a reversal of power. In this relationship, she relinquishes all control to him and receives rough sex and punishment for her questionably corrupt ways as a form of catharsis. Includes deep throat, anal sex, strict bondage sex and pain play.
title: Role Reversal
